title: Mike O'Brien | Rudy Giuliani Says Trump Lied About Stormy Daniels: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Rudy Giuliani telling everyone in an interview that the president lied about paying hush money to a porn star.

Then, A.P. Bio creator Mike O'Brien rants about British actors who think they have great American accents and explains why he thinks the Kama Sutra should be an audiobook. He also expands on his one-sided feud with Betty White.

As an added bonus, at 18:24 Seth and Mike continue the conversation backstage at Studio 8G, where they talk about their Chicago roots and how it informed their SNL careers.


LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
